entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low 8.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
